short_summary: (Translated) On behalf of the Ministry of Health and Social Services, Shared Services is seeking submissions from qualified providers for information on the acquisition of an information management system for the part of the shared services department that deal with the judicial court system.
description: Procurement Shared Services (PSS) on behalf of the Department of Finance (FIN) is requesting submissions from qualified respondents for Request for Information for the provision of a Court Services Information Management Systems.
duration_in_months: My estimate is this procurement is 1 month approximately.
full_summary:
# Court Services Management Systems Solicitation Announcement
## Government of the Northwest Territories
#### Solicitation Number: EV7453

## Request for Information (RFI)

The Government of the Northwest Territories, represented by the Department of Finance (FIN) through Procurement Shared Services (PSS), has issued a Request for Information (RFI) on seeking qualified submitters for the provision of a Court Services Management Information System. 

The RFI is open to all qualified vendors interested in responding to the requirements identified in the tender package. 

### Key Details:

* **Solicitation Number:** EV7453
* **Publication Date:** May 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 7, 2024, 5:00 PM AST
* **Contracting Entity:** Government of the Northwest Territories
* **Location:** Yellowknife, NT, Canada

### Description
The proposed system will leverage innovative technologies to provide a comprehensive Court Services Management System, enabling the efficient management of court operations, workflow processes, and communication amongst stakeholders to ensure fair due process.

## How to Access Information

* All tender related documents, including addenda (when applicable), are available on the Contracts and Tenders web page at: https://contracts.fin.gov.nt.ca/
* Select "Procurement Opportunities" then "Request for Information (RFI)" to locate the solicitation announcement.

### Mandatory Contact Information

* **Contract Administrator:** reachable at PSSTenders@gov.nt.ca or (867) 767-9044

### Submission Guidelines

* Ensure that your submission includes all required documentation, as specified in the tender package.
* Respondents are responsible for ensuring compliance with all applicable rules, regulations, and requirements outlined in the RFI.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the submission's relevance, clarity, and completeness in addressing the requirements outlined in the tender package. The evaluation process is competitive and open to all interested vendors.

### Follow-up Contact
Questions regarding the RFI or clarification of any technical details may be directed to Contract Administrator: PSSTenders@gov.nt.ca or (867) 767-9044. 

Please note that this RFI is for information purposes only. The Government of the Northwest Territories, Procurement Shared Services (PSS), reserves the right to modify or cancel the RFI at any point during the solicitation process. All interested parties are expected to review the terms and conditions carefully before submitting their response.
